statements: SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE cost < 50.00 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, cost FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 500 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions, cost, timestamp FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, cost FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 50 AND cost < 100 ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE cost BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, conversions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE impressions < 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_metrics
SELECT clicks, impressions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE conversions > 5
SELECT campaign_id FROM ad_campaign_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 100
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_campaign_metrics ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT a.campaign_id, a.impressions, a.clicks, b.date, b.actions_taken FROM ad_campaign_metrics a INNER JOIN ad_campaign_history b ON a.campaign_id = b.campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, conversions FROM ad_campaign_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 AND clicks < 500 ORDER BY conversions ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_metrics WHERE date='2022-01-15';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(spend) AS total_spend FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT adp.performance_id, adp.campaign_id, adp.date, adp.spend, adp.revenue, adc.campaign_name FROM ad_performance adp JOIN ad_campaigns adc ON adp.campaign_id = adc.campaign_id;

SELECT adc.campaign_id, adc.campaign_name, am.date, am.impressions, am.clicks, (am.clicks / am.impressions * 100) AS ctr FROM ad_campaigns adc JOIN ad_metrics am ON adc.campaign_id = am.campaign_id WHERE am.date = '2021-02-15';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, click_time, platform FROM ad_clicks WHERE platform='Google' ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT ad_id, impression_time, user_id FROM ad_impressions WHERE user_id=1001 ORDER BY impression_time ASC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions, ctr FROM ad_performance WHERE ad_id=101 ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_performance ON ad_campaigns.id=ad_performance.ad_id WHERE budget >= 10000 ORDER BY ctr DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_impressions WHERE date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM ad_metrics WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_metrics GROUP BY date;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date LIMIT 5;
